PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-04281998-03-190,  ,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY
PrecisDecision of the Governor in Council, having considered the petition filed by the Canadian Federation of Independent Business, NOT TO VARY an Order made by the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission (TELECOM ORDER CRTC 97-803) concerning the restructuring by BELL CANADA of business rates for local exchange services.
Attachments
